structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.history: Repealed 1956 Ky. Acts ch. 25, sec. 11, effective May 18, 1956. -- Amended 1944 Ky. Acts ch. 52, sec. 1. -- Amended 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 53, secs. 1 and 2. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 3235b-12, 3235b-13.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Appropriations for park purposes; separate funds for white and colored park board.
